document.full_text: virus samples will be shared globally in exchange for vaccines produced from them under a landmark deal to improve preparedness for a flu pandemic, diplomats at the world health organization said on saturday.
document.title: big pharma backs deal to boost flu pandemic readiness
lines_and_colors: virus samples will be shared globally in exchange for vaccines produced from them under a landmark deal to improve preparedness for a flu pandemic, diplomats at the world health organization said on saturday.
